import React from "react"; import { rooturl } from "../utils/functions"; import axios from "axios"; export default function ProductForm(props){ let options = []; set let token = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('authToken')).access axios.get(rooturl+'/api/category-list/', {headers:{ Authorization : `Bearer ${token}` }}) .then(res => { let data = res.data; }) console.log(options) return(
